thread.title: Tammy Hawkins

author: Tammy Hawkins
title: Tammy Hawkins
text: It's taken all the stress out of ensuring Barney has the right food, right quantity, right time. He never runs out it's delivered to the door in perfect condition. No more running to the shop. Barney loves the food couldn't be happier and the email reminders are fantastic means he never runs out and leaves me with one less thing to worry about. Win win in all areas!
